name: Nonogram.ly Color
description:
Welcome to Nonogram.ly Color! It's a color logic puzzle game, which makes you forget all pressures. Just according to numbers and color beside, color squares or fill in crosses to unlock wonderful images.

There are different sizes of the game board, including 5×5, 10×10, 15×15, and 20×20. Even larger-scale puzzles are waiting for your challenge.

If you are a master, the following functions will bring you a novelty experience.
Progress is saved in real-time. All your game data will be kept even when you transfer to a new phone.
The game board can be zoomed in, which makes your operation easier.
Spotlight, Cross Reminder, and more helpful tools make your operation more accurate so that your HPs won't lose by mistake.

If you are a beginner, it is recommended to complete the easy levels first. The process of learning also brings you happiness.
You can start the game by learning the basic rules.
Numbers beside the game board indicates the color and number of squares you need to draw in each row or column.
Select color and color the correlative squares to unlock wonderful pictures.
According to the color and numbers aside, analyze how to color squares.
If you think one square should be left blank, then mark it with an X.
Don't worry about making mistakes, you have chances to get extra HPs.
